summary: REQ-1 is not verifiably implemented from the provided truncated diff, and the diff shows multiple unrelated changes to the Privacy page (loading/error states, actor hooks, SEO side effects, header/back link, and dynamic last-updated date), plus modifications to non-requested files.

missing_requirements.requirement: On /privacy, update only Section 12 "Contacto" to remove hardcoded store contact details and replace with the specified paragraph and a standalone @tanstack/react-router Link to /contacto, without changing other sections or adding loading/error/data-fetch patterns.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet for PrivacyPage.tsx is truncated before Section 12, so there is no evidence that the Section 12 content was updated as specified (removal of the `bg-muted p-6 rounded-lg space-y-3` div, removal of mailto/tel/details, exact paragraph text, and exact Link text/className). Additionally, the visible changes indicate broader modifications to the page beyond Section 12, which violates the 'update only Section 12' constraint in REQ-1.

hallucinated_features.description: Added loading state with spinner and "Cargando política de privacidad..." message for the /privacy page.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids introducing data fetching, loading states, fallback handling, or error handling for this contact section update, and the change was supposed to be limited to Section 12 only.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/public/PrivacyPage.tsx (adds isInitialLoading state and early return with Loader2 spinner)

hallucinated_features.description: Added error state handling (`error` state and an error UI).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest forbids introducing error handling for this update and limits changes to Section 12 only.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/public/PrivacyPage.tsx (adds `error` state and renders an error block)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced actor-related logic (`useActor`, `stableActor`) and a simulated initial data fetch via `setTimeout`.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also violates the constraint to not introduce data-fetching/loading patterns and to only modify Section 12.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/public/PrivacyPage.tsx (imports `useActor`, uses `stableActor`, simulates loading with setTimeout)

hallucinated_features.description: Added SEO side effects: setting document title and creating/updating meta description tag.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and constitutes changes outside Section 12.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/public/PrivacyPage.tsx (useEffect that sets `document.title` and meta description)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a back link UI to home ("Volver al inicio") with ArrowLeft icon at top of page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and changes layout outside Section 12.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/public/PrivacyPage.tsx (Back Link section with Link to "/" and ArrowLeft)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a dynamic "Última actualización" date computed at runtime.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and changes content outside Section 12.
BuildRequest asked for a frontend-only change limited to Section 12 on /privacy; editing these meta/state files was not requested.
